00008 #include "oggsupport.h"

00013 #if defined(OGG) || defined(TREMOR)
00014 
00015 short openOGGSound(const std::string& filename, SDL_AudioSpec *pspec, stHQSound *psound)
00016 {
00017  // If Ogg detected, decode it into the stream psound->sound_buffer.
00018  // It must fit into the Audio_cvt structure, so that it can be converted
00019 
00020     OggVorbis_File  oggStream;     // stream handle
00021 
00022     if(ov_fopen( (char *)GetFullFileName(filename).c_str(), &oggStream ) != 0)
00023     {
00024         return 1;
00025     }
00026     else
00027     {
00028      long bytes;
00029      char array[BUFFER_SIZE];
00030      std::vector<char> buffer;
00031         vorbis_info*    vorbisInfo;    // some formatting data
00032         vorbis_comment* vorbisComment; // user comments
00033 
00034      int bitStream;
00035         vorbisInfo = ov_info(&oggStream, -1);
00036         vorbisComment = ov_comment(&oggStream, -1);
00037 
00038         pspec->format = AUDIO_S16LSB; // Ogg Audio seems to always use this format
00039 
00040         pspec->channels = vorbisInfo->channels;
00041         pspec->freq = vorbisInfo->rate;
00042 
00043         psound->sound_len = 0;
00044         do {
00045    // Read up to a buffer's worth of decoded sound data
00046 #if defined(OGG)
00047          bytes = ov_read(&oggStream, array, BUFFER_SIZE, 0, 2, 1, &bitStream);
00048 #elif defined(TREMOR)
00049          bytes = ov_read(&oggStream, array, BUFFER_SIZE, &bitStream);
00050 #endif
00051    // Append to end of buffer
00052    buffer.insert(buffer.end(), array, array + bytes);
00053         } while (bytes > 0);
00054 
00055         ov_clear(&oggStream);
00056 
00057         psound->sound_len = buffer.size();
00058 
00059         psound->sound_buffer = (Uint8*) malloc( psound->sound_len );
00060         for(Uint32 i=0; i<psound->sound_len ; i++ )
00061         {
00062          memcpy( &(psound->sound_buffer[i]), &(buffer[i]), 1);
00063         }
00064 
00065   return 0;
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 long pcm_size;
00070 long music_pos;
00071 
00072 bool openOGGStream(const std::string& filename, SDL_AudioSpec *pspec, OggVorbis_File  &oggStream)
00073 {
00074  // If Ogg detected, decode it into the stream psound->sound_buffer.
00075  // It must fit into the Audio_cvt structure, so that it can be converted
00076 
00077     if(ov_fopen((char*)GetFullFileName(filename).c_str(), &oggStream) != 0)
00078     {
00079         return false;
00080     }
00081     else
00082     {
00083         vorbis_info*    vorbisInfo;    // some formatting data
00084         vorbis_comment* vorbisComment; // user comments
00085 
00086         vorbisInfo = ov_info(&oggStream, -1);
00087         vorbisComment = ov_comment(&oggStream, -1);
00088 
00089         pspec->format = AUDIO_S16LSB; // Ogg Audio seems to always use this format
00090 
00091         pspec->channels = vorbisInfo->channels;
00092         pspec->freq = vorbisInfo->rate;
00093 
00094         pcm_size = ov_pcm_total(&oggStream,-1);
00095         pcm_size *= (vorbisInfo->channels*2);
00096         music_pos = 0;
00097 
00098   return true;
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool reading_stream = false;
00103 int bitStream = 0;
00104 bool readOGGStream( OggVorbis_File  &oggStream, char *buffer, const size_t &size, const SDL_AudioSpec &OGGAudioSpec )
00105 {
00106  long bytes = 0;
00107  unsigned long pos = 0;
00108  //int bitStream = 0;
00109  reading_stream = true;
00110 
00111  while( pos<size )
00112  {
00113   if(pcm_size<=0)
00114    break;
00115   // Read up to a buffer's worth of decoded sound data
00116  #if defined(OGG)
00117   bytes = ov_read(&oggStream, buffer+pos, size-pos, 0, 2, 1, &bitStream);
00118  #elif defined(TREMOR)
00119   bytes = ov_read(&oggStream, buffer+pos, size-pos, &bitStream);
00120  #endif
00121   pos += bytes;
00122   music_pos += bytes;
00123   if( bytes <= 0 || music_pos >= pcm_size )
00124   {
00125    memset( buffer+pos, OGGAudioSpec.silence, size-pos );
00126    pos = size;
00127    bitStream = 0;
00128    music_pos = 0;
00129    reading_stream = false;
00130    return true;
00131   }
00132  }
00133  reading_stream = false;
00134  return false;
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool readOGGStreamAndResample( OggVorbis_File  &oggStream, char *buffer, const size_t output_size, const size_t input_size, const SDL_AudioSpec &OGGAudioSpec )
00138 {
00139  char buf[input_size];
00140 
00141  bool eof = readOGGStream( oggStream, buf, input_size, OGGAudioSpec );
00142 
00143  resample((Uint8*)buffer, (Uint8*)buf, output_size, input_size, OGGAudioSpec.format, OGGAudioSpec.channels);
00144 
00145  return eof;
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 void cleanupOGG(OggVorbis_File  &oggStream)
00150 {
00151  while(reading_stream);
00152  music_pos = 0;
00153  pcm_size = 0;
00154  ov_clear(&oggStream);
00155 }

00157 #if defined(TREMOR)
00158 int ov_fopen(char *path,OggVorbis_File *vf)
00159 {
00160  int result;
00161     FILE *fp = fopen(path, "rb");
00162  if((result = ov_open(fp, vf, NULL, 0)) < 0)
00163   fclose(fp);
00164  return result;
00165 }
